results.output:
ğŸ“‹ Data Manager Usage:
  node data-manager.js export [path]
  node data-manager.js import <path>
  node data-manager.js backup [name]
  node data-manager.js restore <backup-key>
  node data-manager.js list-backups

ğŸ¯ Selective Seeder Usage:
  node selective-seeder.js list
  node selective-seeder.js seed <scenario-name>

Example:
  node selective-seeder.js seed search-basic

ğŸ” Data Validator Usage:
  node data-validator.js files       - Validate test data files
  node data-validator.js database     - Validate DynamoDB data
  node data-validator.js opensearch   - Validate OpenSearch data
  node data-validator.js consistency  - Check data consistency
  node data-validator.js all          - Run all validations

ğŸ”„ Data Reset Usage:
  node data-reset.js list                    - List available reset states
  node data-reset.js reset <state>          - Reset to specific state
  node data-reset.js snapshot <name>        - Create data snapshot
  node data-reset.js restore <snapshot>     - Restore from snapshot
  node data-reset.js validate               - Validate current state
  node data-reset.js clear [type]           - Clear data (all/dynamodb/opensearch/s3)

Example:
  node data-reset.js reset fresh
  node data-reset.js reset search-ready

ğŸ§ª Test Utilities Usage:
  node test-utilities.js connectivity  - Test service connections
  node test-utilities.js data          - Test data integrity
  node test-utilities.js search        - Test search functionality
  node test-utilities.js performance   - Test performance metrics
  node test-utilities.js all           - Run all tests
  node test-utilities.js cleanup       - Clean up test data

ğŸ”„ Data Migration Utility Usage:
  node data-migration-utility.js list                    - List available migrations
  node data-migration-utility.js run <migration>         - Run specific migration
  node data-migration-utility.js run-all                 - Run all migrations
  node data-migration-utility.js validate                - Validate migration results
  node data-migration-utility.js rollback <migration>    - Rollback specific migration

Example:
  node data-migration-utility.js run add-missing-fields

ğŸ“Š Data Monitoring Utility Usage:
  node data-monitoring-utility.js check                    - Run single health check
  node data-monitoring-utility.js monitor [interval]       - Start continuous monitoring
  node data-monitoring-utility.js report                   - Generate monitoring report
  node data-monitoring-utility.js alerts [severity]        - List alerts
  node data-monitoring-utility.js clear-alerts             - Clear all alerts
  node data-monitoring-utility.js test-alerts              - Test alert system

Example:
  node data-monitoring-utility.js monitor 10000  # Monitor every 10 seconds
  node data-monitoring-utility.js alerts high    # Show only high severity alerts

ğŸ”„ Data Sync Utility Usage:
  node data-sync-utility.js dynamo-to-os                    - Sync DynamoDB to OpenSearch
  node data-sync-utility.js os-to-dynamo                    - Sync OpenSearch to DynamoDB
  node data-sync-utility.js detect-conflicts                - Detect data conflicts
  node data-sync-utility.js resolve-conflicts [strategy]    - Resolve conflicts
  node data-sync-utility.js sync-point <name>               - Create sync point
  node data-sync-utility.js validate-sync-point <file>      - Validate sync point

Conflict Resolution Strategies:
  â€¢ latest (default) - Use most recently updated data
  â€¢ dynamo_wins      - DynamoDB data takes precedence
  â€¢ opensearch_wins  - OpenSearch data takes precedence

Example:
  node data-sync-utility.js resolve-conflicts latest
